*div1 type="summary"* *p*James W. Breedlove to Austin, New Orleans, November 12, 1830. Regrets developments concerning George Fisher. Emigration to Texas greater than last year. Mexican politics.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexican Consulate*/location_mentioned**/p* *p**location_mentioned*New Orleans*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-12-1830">Novr. 12 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir Your favor of the *date_mentioned n="10-13-1830">13th Oct */date_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Mr Ker*/person_mentioned* reached me this morning, and contents observed. I regret much to learn that *person_mentioned*George Fisher*/person_mentioned* had turned out so badly. I had formed a favorable opinion of him. I am very glad that you have placed his character in its proper light before me as he may perhaps wend his way hither, having a *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Mississippi*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I am of opinion that the Emigration to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*this *date_mentioned n="Winter-1830">Winter */date_mentioned*will be much greater than any previous season. If I may be allowed to Judge from the many letters addressed to me from *location_mentioned*all parts of the United States*/location_mentioned*, asking information respecting the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned*— By this conveyance I send you many letters etc received for the last two Mos*/p*
*p*I am much gratified to learn that things are going on well in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*, and that the present *person_mentioned*administration */person_mentioned*have better feelings towards *person_mentioned*North Americans*/person_mentioned*, Should *person_mentioned*Genl Bustamante */person_mentioned*progress well with the affairs of the Genl Government until the next presidential Election? he will doubtless obtain the voice of the people for *person_mentioned*President*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*General Pedraza the President*/person_mentioned* Elect before *person_mentioned*Guerrero*/person_mentioned*, is now *location_mentioned*here in Exile*/location_mentioned*, he seems to be a man of good sense, modest and unassuming living a very retired life, on his return from *location_mentioned*Europe */location_mentioned*to *location_mentioned*Vera Cruz*/location_mentioned* he met an order from the *person_mentioned*Supreme Government*/person_mentioned* ordering him from the*location_mentioned* Coast of Mexico*/location_mentioned*, he came here*date_mentioned n="10-xx-1830"> about a month since*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas W Breedlove */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin Texas*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Schr Reaper*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
